response.overview: Shortlisted for "Bucheon International Fantastic Film Festival" After "Ghost Hospital", South Korea's live broadcast is another terrifying documentary horror film. Do you dare to come here to receive authentic Korean "blessings", "if it's a ghost, come out, if it's a human, get out!!" The director's debut film: a film that confronts human nature, more terrifying than ghosts, and unpredictable development. Deep in the mountains of Gangwon-do, in an abandoned church known for its ghosts, TV producers, wizards and mystical experience groups want: Prove the existence of ghosts! Taking an unexpected turn, in this spooky church, mysterious figures begin to appear to those who come to experience these bizarre events.
response.title: Possessed
